attributes.background: Our Tory Council leader can stay wedged in his safe council seat because there is no viable alternative. What I would like to see is a system of governance that goes beyond politics and one whereby citizens who feel that the leader is failing in his/her public duties should be forced to resign.

rejection.details: It's not clear how you would like the local government system to be changed. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like to happen.
